response.original_title: Соглашаюсь на всю работу в интернете
response.overview: Can you really make easy money online without getting scammed? And if it’s possible — how much: millions or just spare change?  Journalist Dasha sets out to find out by saying yes to every job offer she finds on the internet.  The experiment turns into an investigation — uncovering how “get-rich” schemes work, who profits from them, and what happens when curiosity meets desperation in the digital economy.
response.tagline: How much money can you make online before you get scammed?
response.title: I Agree to Every Online Job Offer
